name: Dust Bunny Sweeper
description:
A game for the 208th Trijam 

The challenge of Trijam is making a game within 3 hours but my development time was just over 2 hours including art. 

The game is so simple and my implementation of the theme, fill the vacuum, is so uninspired that I wondered if this was worth making. But I was bored so I made it. I think the result is more entertaining than most of the other games I made for Trijam though.

Controls:

A, D or Arrow Keys to move left and right relative to the vacuum cleaner.

Scoring:

1 second passing: +10

Collecting a dust bunny: +100

Leaving the play area: -500

My high score is 9400

Sound Credits:

Sound Effects from Zapsplat: https://www.zapsplat.com/

Music by Eric Matyas: https://soundimage.org/
